titleStmt.title: Great Brittaines sunnes-set, bewailed with a shower of teares. By William Basse
titleStmt.author: Basse, William, d. ca. 1653.

notesStmt.note: Verse on the death of Henry Frederick, Prince of Wales.
All copies known are fragments in or from bindings.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
